fields.introduction: David Oliver Tate has learned not to use first person pronouns when writing his own about the author. He also believes the saying 'life is like a box of chocolates you never know what you're gonna get' is a phrase for elitist snobs. Who can afford those fancy-ass chocolates boxes where each and every flavor is different? David can't. The phrase would better be, 'Life is like a box of chocolates. You know exactly what you're going to get because it's always the same cheap crap that's never very great. Unless you're super rich.' Sheesh, I'm sounding like a whiner.
David Oliver Tate is not a whiner. Wait, anyone who whines about not being a whiner is the biggest whiner. Lightbulb moment.
David Oliver Tate is a whiner.
David Oliver Tate is not a whiner entirely.

After many failed attempts, your author decided not to include an About the Author. Please note there are no more bios after this one. As such — if you go back in time via clicking the button — your page will not refresh. You will not pass go. You will not collect $200, but you will receive a 500 error in your console along with the following message: parallel_place_api. models. about_the_author. About_The_Author .Does NotExist: 'About_The_Author matching query does not exist.' This is less than ideal.
